function DiscreteLP (in M)
 Compute the DLP's, P_m(i, M) for m = 0 .. M, i = 1 .. M + 1.

Function Documentation

function DiscreteLP ( in  M)

Compute the DLP's, P_m(i, M) for m = 0 .. M, i = 1 .. M + 1.

m is the "order" and M is the maximum degree. This follows Neuman, Eqs. 10, 30, and 31. However, we apply the normalization right away to ease expansions.
